title: [Cleric Guild, Courtyard]
description: Several large bushes grow against the walls of a small low-roofed shrine, their snow-covered forms displaying delicate icy blue rose blossoms.  The structure appears to be nearly frozen, its soft dappled pink and white walls visible underneath a glistening coat of thin ice.  Rounded doors of the same speckled hue lead into the small building, their surfaces engraved with whimsical designs.

Several large bushes grow against the walls of a small low-roofed shrine, their snow-covered forms displaying delicate icy blue rose blossoms.  The structure appears to be nearly frozen, its soft dappled pink and white walls visible underneath a coat of thin ice that shines softly in the moonlight.  Rounded doors of the same speckled hue lead into the small building, their surfaces engraved with whimsical designs.
